metadata.synopsis: Outcome of a final decision in the evil ending in which the player decides to psionically influence the city to collapse into chaos, and leave.

4.text: *This was always to be their fate. You just gave them the final nudge they needed.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Psionics wash over the masses. They rise to their feet uncertainly. Focus on one of the enthralled, who glances at his neighbour then sucker punches him.  His victim hasn't even hit the ground before the puncher is stabbed in the back by a pitchfork-wielding third baldurian.

5.text: *This was always to be their fate. You just gave them the final nudge they needed.*
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Assorted quick shots of the crowd turning on each other (verbally and physically), running amok, breaking doors and windows.
